column4: Hi, i've got a problem runnning my ATI card with DRI support for Beryl, can someone help me?
what's your problem?  i just got it working a couple days ago
Xfree86 error on displau 0:0 NO DRI......
next time it does it, it should give you a specific line in xorg that messes up, find it
Xorg is running fine, the problem is when I launch beryl manager, there are no problems in my Xorg.conf
:) I mean Xorg is running fine, I just can't launch Beryl :)
yes i know, but i had to disable my composite in xorg even though it let me enable it
and for the DRI support? (card is RV370)
see first if disabling composite fixes dri
